extendedInfo.description: The KCTCS mobile app connects you to your KCTCS college with access to classes, instructors, libraries, bookstores, web sites, news, events, social media, and more...  My Classes* - View your classes including schedule, maps, rosters, assignments, discussions, and grades. Library Catalog - Search your college library or across all KCTCS libraries.Bookstore - Connect to your college bookstore.Contact Us - Contact your college or Student Service Center for assistance or more information.Directory* - Find and connect to people at KCTCS.Maps - Find your way around your college's campuses.Web Site - Connect to your college mobile website.News - Catch up on what's happening at your college.Events - Check out upcoming events at your college and add them to your personal calendar.Videos - Check out your college on YouTube.Facebook - Connect to your college through Facebook.Twitter - Connect to your college through Twitter.Notifications* â View your messages from Admissions, Financial Aid, Student Billing, Student Records, and more.   KCTCS is the official mobile app of the Kentucky Community and Technical College System. Our 16 colleges are located on 68 campuses across the state of Kentucky and online:Ashland Community and Technical College (ACTC)Big Sandy Community and Technical College (BSCTC)Bluegrass Community and Technical College (BCTC)Bowling Green Technical College (BGTC)Elizabethtown Community and Technical College (ECTC)Gateway Community and Technical College (GCTC)Hazard Community and Technical College (HCTC)Henderson Community College (HCC)Hopkinsville Community College (HCC)Jefferson Community and Technical College (JCTC)Madisonville Community College (MCC)Maysville Community and Technical College (MCTC)Owensboro Community and Technical College (OCTC)Somerset Community College (SCC)Southeast Kentucky Community and Technical College (SKCTC)West Kentucky Community and Technical College (WKCTC)To visit another KCTCS college, click the ""Go2..."" button at the top right corner of the Home page.*To access My Classes, Directory and Notifications, please login with your KCTCS username and password.

reviews.title: Handy!
reviews.comment: Love the idea of it and definitely handy  but wish I could check my email from the app and wish it had a widget so I could be notified of new updates (:
reviews.author: Taylor Smith

reviews.title: Very handy! However...
reviews.comment: Would be extremely helpful if there was a direct access to Student Emails... but so far, very useful. About time someone came out with a useful App!...
reviews.author: Shannon Harrington

reviews.title: Pretty good, but has so much potential!
reviews.comment: This app is great for keeping track of classes and the directory is handy. Sadly, the maps don\'t work properly, and it would be so much more convenient if the app kept me logged in, instead of making me enter my password every other time.
reviews.author: jessica hurtt

reviews.title: Nice!
reviews.comment: Does everything it should but I would love it if it could run in the background and notify me whenever there are any updates in my courses.. assignments, grades, discussions, etc.
reviews.author: Andrew Jackson

reviews.title: Waste of time
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t recognize my password or username which I know are correct. Also sucks having to log in every time as well.
reviews.author: Randy Neal

reviews.title: Works well
reviews.comment: Its a useful app, it\'d be more useful if it had better maps of the campuses
reviews.author: Casey Moore
